title: Drawing, "Textile Design: Blue stars", 1800–18
medium: Brush and gouache on blue wove paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and brown ink, lower right: L.A.D. 816
dimensions:
Sheet: 12.8 x 12.7 cm (5 1/16 in. x 5 in.)
Image: 7.7 x 7.6 cm (3 1/16 in. x 3 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase from Friends of the Museum Fund
description: Small blue stars with white pinwheel centers surrounded by black leaf design on reddish-brown ground.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Textile Design: Blue stars", 1800–18.Brush and gouache on blue wove paper. Museum purchase from Friends of the Museum Fund. 1957-46-83.
